response.job_title: Machine Learning Subject Matter Expert | Deep Learning Expert | Technical Lead |
response.summary:
I’m a passionate for learn and do science, my main interest is to figure out how can we make smart computers (smart in the true sense of the word) as mostly people knows the intelligence of the computer resides in the software and how well handles the information to extract knowledge from data.

I'm good at coding so I want to be one of the bridges which links the advances in the machine learning, big data and parallel computing to the common user industry.
response.skills: PyTorch, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data Science, Data Visualization, Team Leadership, Big Data, Leadership, Team Development, Embedded Systems, Federated Machine Learning, Mentoring, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Recommender Systems, Data Pipelines, Project Management, TensorFlow, Machine Learning, Apache Spark

profile_positions.description:
- Redesign the entire suite of pipelines that the company currently uses in the
analytics area, enhancing the capacity of data-driven decision-making.
- Provide mentorship within the analytics team concerning the implementation
and optimization of Recommender Systems
profile_positions.title: External Data & Machine Learning Expert Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Led the Machine Learning practices for Quantiphi's Latin American pre-sales team, helping secure deals and build technical trust at C-level meetings, hence scoping the project deliverables and handling the client's expectations.
- Spearheaded a team of Machine Learning and Embedded Systems specialists for a research project in the Automotive Industry. Whose main contribution was the inclusion of Federated Machine Learning techniques over Edge Devices.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Led the design of Machine Learning systems to be implemented as solutions in multiple business units.
- Manage the quality and progress of ongoing projects while fostering talent development within the team.
- Build complex, scalable deep learning models in multiple projects such as: Personalization in Recommender Systems, Targeted Advert Campaigns and Automated Fraud Detection
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Expert

profile_positions.description:
- Played a key role in pivoting the company towards a Data Analytics and Machine Learning focus, while building a Data Science team from scratch. This strategic shift and team development were instrumental in our Data Science team's acquisition by Latin America's biggest e-commerce company.
- Spearheaded Machine Learning \& Big Data pipelines to be implemented as solutions to consulting projects in the LATAM region over multiple business verticals.
-  Manage the quality and progress of ongoing projects while fostering talent development within the team.
- Led the company certification processes for Google’s ”Partner Machine Learning Certification” and ”Partner Data Analytics Certification”.
profile_positions.title: Lead Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
- Designed and implemented Computer Vision models using advanced Deep Learning techniques.
- Constructed intricate Big Data pipelines, integrating both structured and unstructured data.
profile_positions.title: Big Data & Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Freelance as content creator for an on-line Course in Spark framework applied to Big Data analysis for
Next-University.
profile_positions.title: Content Creator for Spark on-line Course

profile_positions.description:
Build the processing architecture and experimental design for big data volumes; mainly
oriented to process, analyze and predict tendencies in retail market and exchange market, using novel techniques in Deep Learning.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:

Computing and Machine Learning research. Support as Junior Researcher
on several Colciencias funded research projects for the “MindLab” research
group into National University of Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Administrator of High Performance Computing (HPC) servers

Administrate several develop and production Linux servers, be the respons-
ible for the network and servers security in the company.
profile_positions.title: Linux System Administrator

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
